name: 托德·林肯
birth_place: 美国,俄克拉荷马州,塔尔萨

last_movies.title: Twittering from the Circus of the Dead

introduction: Born and raised in Tulsa, Oklahoma. Lincoln lives in Los Angeles.He recently wrote and directed THE APPARITION starring Ashley Greene (Twilight) and Sebastian Stan (Captain America) for Dark Castle / Warner Bros., opening in theatres everywhere 2012.Lincoln is attached to direct TWITTERING FROM THE CIRCUS OF THE DEAD, an adaptation of the short story by Joe Hill (Horns, Heart-Shaped Box) for Mandalay Pictures.His award-winning short films and commercials have screened at film festivals, art galleries and microcinemas around the world, while his music videos have played on MTV and Fuse.Lincoln has been profiled in The New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Wired, Ain't It Cool News, LA Weekly, USA Today, Variety, Hollywood Reporter, Boards and Creativity magazine.He is co-founder and director of the OVERGROUND FILM FESTIVAL, an annual event showcasing the world's most innovative short films and new media.Todd Lincoln is represented by Craig Gering at CAA and managed by Dallas Sonnier at CALIBER MEDIA CO.（from http://www.toddlincoln.com/bio/index.html）
